remarks: The function ` F ` used in ~ xpsval is a homeomorphism from the binary product topology to the indexed product topology.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
statement:
xpstopnlem1.f $e |- F = ( x e. X , y e. Y |-> `' ( { x } +c { y } ) ) $.
xpstopnlem1.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
xpstopnlem1.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) ) $.
xpstopnlem1 $p |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( J tX K ) Homeo ( Xt_ ` `' ( { J } +c { K } ) ) ) ) $.
$d J x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d ph x y $.
